question: Which of the following is an online platform launched with an aim to “Improve children’s education by enhancing interaction between schools as well as parents and providing data-driven decision support system to assist parents in taking best decisions for their children’s future”?
explanation: Saransh is an online platform that aims to “Improve children’s education by enhancing interaction between schools as well as parents and providing data-driven decision support system to assist them in taking best decisions for their children’s future”, CBSE, has developed the platform in-house. The mobile App for Saransh has also been launched. This tool allows schools to identify areas of improvement in students, teachers and curriculum and take necessary measures to implement change by comparison of results. “Saransh” has been conferred with the e-India 2015 Award for ‘Best Government Initiative in Education’, SKOCH Order of Merit for ‘Smart Project’ and SKOCH AWARD (Highest Independent Honour).
